Headline: Green Line Delays, Limited Service Between Garfield and Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: Green Line service experiencing delays at Garfield; limited service via train shuttle available btwn Cottage Grove & Garfield.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Cottage Grove-bound Green Line trains are experiencing delays near Garfield.

We are running as much service possible with available staff.

As a result, Cottage Grove trains are operating in two sections:

  • between Harlem and Garfield, and,
  • between Garfield and Cottage Grove, with limited service.

For service to Cottage Grove, alight trains at Garfield; shuttle train service to Cottage Grove can be boarded on the Harlem-bound platform side at Garfield.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Paxton
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Jeffery, 76th, Yates, and 79th due to, street blockage near 79th/Paxton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Jeffery, 76th, Yates, and 79th, due to street blockage near 79th/Paxton.

Allow extra travel time.
